document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">One </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">crown </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">seeks </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">highest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">head </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">isolation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">coveted </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">stigma </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">deified </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">While </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Pontius </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Pilate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">lives </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">whatsoever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">hell </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">coronation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">pierces </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">recollects </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">well. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: One crown that no one seeks
